metadataAttributes.Title: Pressure, Force, Motion, and Humidity Sensors
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: "Pressure, Force, Motion, and Humidity Sensors" can also be taken for academic credit as ECEA 5342, part of CU Boulder’s Master of Science in Electrical Engineering degree.
